none: 福島県篠葉沢稲荷神社の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Shinobasawa Inari Shrine, Fukushima (Original)

篠葉沢稲荷神社様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。伊藤保生様には、ご親切なご支援を賜り、感謝申し上げます。 版権所有・We would like to thank Shinobazawa Inari Shrine for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive. Many thanks to Yasuo Ito for their kind support. All Rights Reserved
篠葉沢稲荷神社・Shinobasawa Inari Shrine
福島県福島市立子山目細内110・110 Mehosonai, Risshiyama, Fukushima City, Fukushima Prefecture
